idea.title: Smart Hackathon Onboarding Bot
idea.description: An AI assistant that personalizes team matching, event scheduling, and resources for hackathon participants.

idea.title: Real-Time Feedback Dashboard
idea.description: A dashboard that collects and analyzes anonymous participant feedback during the hackathon to improve live experience.

idea.title: Virtual Career Fair Room
idea.description: A web-based VR experience where students can visit company booths, chat with recruiters, and submit resumes.

idea.title: Project Health Monitor
idea.description: A system that tracks GitHub commit activity, team sentiment, and progress to help mentors support struggling teams.

idea.title: Sponsor-Student Matcher
idea.description: AI that matches students to sponsoring companies based on interests, skills, and resumes.

idea.title: Green Hack Tracker
idea.description: A tool that scores hackathon projects based on their environmental impact and sustainability.

idea.title: AutoPitch Generator
idea.description: Tool that summarizes a teamâ€™s GitHub README and progress into a 1-minute pitch deck and script.
